short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to find relevant meta tags on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find relevant meta tags and meta data present on every website.
Each search is stored, so you can quickly check whether the search was carried out on the current website.
It stores all your searches in a table, so you can look up the meta tags of all the sites where you searched.
